item.title: Erdogan rival arrested days before becoming presidential candidate
item.description: Protests erupt in the streets of Istanbul after the move, despite a four-day ban on demonstrations.

item.title: UN says worker killed in Gaza as Israeli air strikes resume
item.description: Israel's military denies attacking the Deir al-Balah compound, after the Hamas-run health ministry blamed an Israeli strike.

item.title: Hungary bans LGBTQ+ Pride marches
item.description: The move from Orban's conservative government is the latest in a crackdown on the LGBT community.

item.title: Who is detained Turkish opposition leader Ekrem Imamoglu?
item.description: Turkey's arrested opposition leader is seen as President Erdogan's most formidable rival.

item.title: Missing American Sudiksha Konanki's family asks she be declared dead
item.description: Police have been searching for the missing University of Pittsburgh student, who was on spring break in Punta Cana, for the past two weeks.
